attributes.action: We demand a complete review of planning & policy guideiines for wind turbines and their associated high voltage transmission lines
attributes.additional_details: We demand a complete review planning & policy guideiines for wind turbines,wind farms,and the associated high voltage transmission lines, pylons & sub-stations. In view of the wealth of newly published worldwide research into their effeciency, and overall ability to have a positive effect on Co2 emissions, Plus the adverse effect they have on our environment and our health.  The Government must listen to the over-whelming public opinion against the existing plans and policies and act now to stop further construction before any further damage is caused.
